queries.text:
import "strings"

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stock_details" and r.symbol == v.symbol)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => not strings.hasSuffix(v: r._field, suffix: "raw"))
  |> toString()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "insight" and r.symbol == v.symbol)
  |> last()
  |> toString()
  |> group()

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "quote" and r.symbol == v.symbol and r._field != "symbol")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "marketState" or r._field == "preMarketPrice" or r._field == "regularMarketPrice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
    v = if r.marketState == "PRE" then
      r.preMarketPrice
    else
      r.regularMarketPrice
    return { r with _value: v }
  })
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)

data = from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recommendation_trend" and r.symbol == v.symbol)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "period")
  |> last()

total = data
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> findColumn(column: "_value", fn: (key) => true)

data
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
    x = if r._field == "strongSell" then
      0.0 / 4.0 * float(v: r._value)
    else if r._field == "sell" then
      1.0 / 4.0 * float(v: r._value)
    else if r._field == "buy" then
      3.0 / 4.0 * float(v: r._value)
    else if r._field == "strongBuy" then
      4.0 / 4.0 * float(v: r._value)
    else
      2.0 / 4.0 * float(v: r._value)
    return { _value: 100.0 * x / float(v: total[0])  }
  })
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recommendation_trend" and r.symbol == v.symbol)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "period")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
    x = if r._field == "strongSell" then
      0
    else if r._field == "sell" then
      1
    else if r._field == "buy" then
      3
    else if r._field == "strongBuy" then
      4
    else
      2
    return { r with sort: x }
  })

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "quote" and r.symbol == v.symbol and r._field == "regularMarketVolume")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: float(v: r._value) / 1000000.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "quote" and r.symbol == v.symbol and r._field == "fiftyTwoWeekLow")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r.index == "Dow Jones Industrial Average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "regularMarketPrice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "quote" and r.symbol == v.symbol and r._field == "fiftyTwoWeekHigh")
  |> last()

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r._field == "regularMarketChangePercent" and r.index != "CBOE Volatility Index")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r.index == "S&P 500")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "regularMarketChangePercent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r.index == "Dow Jones Industrial Average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "regularMarketChangePercent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r.index == "CBOE Volatility Index")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "regularMarketChangePercent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r.index == "NASDAQ Composite")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "regularMarketChangePercent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r.index == "NASDAQ Composite")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "regularMarketPrice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r.index == "S&P 500")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "regularMarketPrice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "indexes" and r.index == "CBOE Volatility Index")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "regularMarketPrice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "quote" and r.symbol == v.symbol and r._field == "trailingPE")
  |> last()

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "quote" and r.symbol == v.symbol and r._field != "symbol")
  |> last()
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
    v = if r.marketState == "PRE" then
      "pre-market"
    else if r.marketState == "POST" then
      "post-market"
    else if r.marketState == "PREPRE" then
      "closed"
    else
      "regular"
    return { r with _value: v }
  })

from(bucket: "primary")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "twitter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sentiment.compound")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
